processingCommand.script:
:SET &TZ# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.SELF-HEALING.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,TIME_ZONE,1)
:PUB &TZ#

:SET &RUN_ID#      = SYS_ACT_PARENT_NR()
:SET &RUN_ID#      = FORMAT(&RUN_ID#)
!:PUBLISH &RUN_ID#,,WORKFLOW

! Get current time and date
:SET &TIME_NOW#  = SYS_TIME_PHYSICAL("HH:MM:SS","&TZ#")
:SET &DATE_NOW#  = SYS_DATE_PHYSICAL("YYYY-MM-DD","&TZ#")
:PUBLISH &TIME_NOW#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &DATE_NOW#,,WORKFLOW

! INC/CTASK
:SET &TICKET_TYPE# = ""

:IF &TICKET# = "null"
:  SET &TICKET# = ""
:  PUBLISH &TICKET#,,WORKFLOW
:ENDIF

:IF &TICKET# <> ""
:  SET &INC# = SUBSTR(&TICKET#,1,3)
:  SET &CTA# = SUBSTR(&TICKET#,1,5)
:  IF &INC# = "INC"
:    SET &TICKET_TYPE# = "INC"
:  ELSE
:    IF &CTA# = "CTASK"
:      SET &TICKET_TYPE# = "CTASK"
:    ELSE
:      PRINT "WARNING - No valid INC/CTASK!"
:      SET &TICKET_TYPE# = ""
:    ENDIF
:  ENDIF
:ENDIF
:PUBLISH &TICKET_TYPE#

:IF &MODULES# = ""
:  PRINT "ERROR - No module selected!"
:  SET &STATUS# = CANCEL_UC_OBJECT(&RUN_ID#, "ENDED_CANCEL")
:ENDIF

:SET &DB# = "false"

:SWITCH "Y"
:  CASE &MODULES# = "WMS"
:    SET &EMODULE# = "WMS"
:    SET &FUNCTION# = "WMS"
:  CASE &MODULES# = "REFS"
:    SET &EMODULE# = "REFS"
:    SET &FUNCTION# = "REFS"
:  CASE &MODULES# = "RW"
:    SET &EMODULE# = "RW"
:    SET &FUNCTION# = "RW"
:  CASE &MODULES# = "EMS"
:    SET &EMODULE# = "EMS"
:    SET &FUNCTION# = "EMS"
:  CASE &MODULES# = "WMS-FAIL"
:    SET &EMODULE# = "WMS"
:    SET &FUNCTION# = "WMS-FAIL"
:  CASE &MODULES# = "REFS-FAIL"
:    SET &EMODULE# = "REFS"
:    SET &FUNCTION# = "REFS-FAIL"
:  CASE &MODULES# = "RW-FAIL"
:    SET &EMODULE# = "RW"
:    SET &FUNCTION# = "RW-FAIL"
:  CASE &MODULES# = "EMS-FAIL"
:    SET &EMODULE# = "EMS"
:    SET &FUNCTION# = "EMS-FAIL"
:  CASE &MODULES# = "DB_WMS"
:    SET &EMODULE# = "WMS"
:    SET &FUNCTION# = "WMS_DB"
:    SET &DB# = "true"
:  CASE &MODULES# = "DB_REFS"
:    SET &EMODULE# = "REFS"
:    SET &FUNCTION# = "REFS_DB"
:    SET &DB# = "true"
:  CASE &MODULES# = "DB_EMS"
:    SET &EMODULE# = "EMS"
:    SET &FUNCTION# = "EMS_DB"
:    SET &DB# = "true"
:ENDSWITCH
:PUBLISH &EMODULE#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &FUNCTION#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &DB#,,WORKFLOW

! Login
:SET &MODULE_LOGIN# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.SELF-HEALING.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, "LOGIN", 1)
:PUBLISH &MODULE_LOGIN#,,WORKFLOW

:SET &NUMBER_ID# = ""
:PUBLISH &NUMBER_ID#,,WORKFLOW

:SET &CLOSE_NUMBER_ID# = ""
:PUBLISH &CLOSE_NUMBER_ID#,,WORKFLOW

! RPTAB
:SET &CHECK_RPTAB# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.SELF-HEALING.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, "CHECK_RPTAB", 1)
:PUBLISH &CHECK_RPTAB#,,WORKFLOW

! Incident Site Update
:SET &INC_SITE_UPDATE# = "false"
:PUBLISH &INC_SITE_UPDATE#,,WORKFLOW
